tests.prompt: For each instruction in the set, verify it produces an intended and observable effect on model output. Flag any that appear to have no impact.
tests.expected_behavior: All instructions show a clear behavioral effect aligned with their rule set.

tests.prompt: Simulate an environment where multiple instructions are active. Verify that none introduce unintended side effects such as contradiction, performance degradation, or output distortion.
tests.expected_behavior: No instruction causes observable regression or breaks compatibility with others.
